A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Good Disney movie\, horrible Star Wars movie! Snoke ends up being nobody\, so why was he even included in the films. Rey is a nobody\, so why is she so powerful? And we did not get to see enough of Luke and his power. He is suppose to be a very powerful Jedi. We get one glimpse of it and then kill him off. I needed more. Definitely the best Star Wars movie based on cinematography\, just left disappointed at the how they portray important characters.
